languages.text: {n}Изуродованный труп рабочего бледной грудой лежит на платформе. Его лицо размозжено, глотка вспорота, а тело испещрено рваными ранами и порезами. Над ним высится офицер Кляйн — в тусклом свете мрак заполняет желобки морщин на лбу, стекая по нахмуренным бровям во впадины глаз. Скальпель едва заметно подрагивает в руке.{/n}

{n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Изуродованный труп рабочего бледной грудой лежит на платформе. Его лицо размозжено, глотка вспорота, а тело испещрено рваными ранами и порезами. Над ним высится офицер Кляйн — в тусклом свете мрак заполняет желобки морщин на лбу, стекая по нахмуренным бровям во впадины глаз. Скальпель едва заметно подрагивает в руке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile before the altar. His face is crushed, his throat is open, and his body is riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands the officer Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le corps mutilé de l'ouvrier gît sur la plateforme tel un mannequin de cire désarticulé. Son visage est enfoncé, sa gorge tranchée et son corps criblé de coupures et de lacérations. Le capitaine Klein le surplombe de toute sa hauteur, la lumière terne projetant sur les rides de son front des ombres qui se propagent le long de ses sourcils froncés et jusqu'au creux de ses orbites. Le scalpel qu'il tient dans sa main tremble légèrement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

Le scalpel qu'il tient dans sa main tremble légèrement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo destrozado del trabajador yace en un montón sobre la plataforma. Tiene la cara aplastada, la garganta abierta y su cuerpo está lleno de cortes y laceraciones. Junto a él está el capitán Klein. La tenue luz llena su frente de sombras que van desde su ceño fruncido hasta las cuencas de sus ojos. El bisturí de su mano tiembla levemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

Junto a él está el capitán Klein. La tenue luz llena su frente de sombras que van desde su ceño fruncido hasta las cuencas de sus ojos. El bisturí de su mano tiembla levemente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个工人残损的尸体躺在平台上的蜡油堆里。他的脸被碾碎了，喉咙被割开了，尸体表面到处都是割裂的伤口。克莱因上尉站在尸体前，昏暗的光线在他的前额投下了阴影，阴影顺着他的眉头流进了他的眼窝。他手里的解剖刀微微颤抖着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个工人残损的尸体躺在平台上的蜡油堆里。他的脸被碾碎了，喉咙被割开了，尸体表面到处都是割裂的伤口。克莱因上尉站在尸体前，昏暗的光线在他的前额投下了阴影，阴影顺着他的眉头流进了他的眼窝。他手里的解剖刀微微颤抖着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}台の上には、労働者の無残な死体が蝋の山のように横たわっている。顔はつぶれ、のどは開き、体は切り傷と裂傷だらけだ。その上にはクライン船長が立っている。薄暗い光に照らされた彼の額のシワは影で埋め尽くされ、眉間にしわを寄せ、目のくぼみにまで影が滲んでいる。手に握るメスがかすかに震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}台の上には、労働者の無残な死体が蝋の山のように横たわっている。顔はつぶれ、のどは開き、体は切り傷と裂傷だらけだ。その上にはクライン船長が立っている。薄暗い光に照らされた彼の額のシワは影で埋め尽くされ、眉間にしわを寄せ、目のくぼみにまで影が滲んでいる。手に握るメスがかすかに震えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die geschundene Leiche des Arbeiters liegt als wachsartiger Haufen auf der Plattform. Sein Gesicht ist zertrümmert, seine Kehle aufgeschlitzt, sein Körper übersät mit Schnitten und Wunden. Über der Leiche steht Captain Klein. Das schwache Licht füllt die Furchen auf seiner Stirn mit Schatten, welche über seine gerunzelten Augenbrauen und hinab in die Höhlen seiner Augen fließen. Das Skalpell in seiner Hand zittert leicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İşçinin perişan hâldeki cesedi, platformdaki solgun yığının içinde uzanıyor. Yüzü ezilmiş, boğazı kesilmiş bedeni kesik ve yırtıklarla delik deşik olmuş. Tepesinde Komutan Klein dikiliyor. Loş ışık, alnındaki çizgileri gölgelerle doldurarak çatılmış kaşlarına sızarak göz çukurlarına hücum ediyor. Elindeki neşter, belli belirsiz titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The worker's ruined body lies in a waxen pile on the platform. His face is crushed, his throat open, and his body riddled with cuts and lacerations. Above it stands Captain Klein, the dim light filling the lines on his forehead with shadows that bleed down his furrowed brows and into the pits of his eyes. The scalpel in his hand trembles faintly.{/n}
